demoInfo.name: Fish Eye
notes: Click to stop and show a pointer

files.styl:
.fish-eye-chart
    text 
      font 10px sans-serif
      text-shadow 1px 1px 1px #ccc

    .axis path, .axis line 
      fill none
      stroke #eee
      shape-rendering crispEdges    
    
    .background 
      fill none
      pointer-events all
    
    .chart-title
      font-size 14px

    .pointer
        fill #7AAE61
        font-size 15px
        opacity 0
